name: Hamster Chips
description:
You really want to buy some chips, but you are short in cash! Collect all three coins and win your beloved chips.

Move using WASD keys and space.

Programming and testing by: Aram Marquez

Character Animations by: Marie Madeleine Rojas Dodeuil , Aram Marquez

Level design by: Aram Marquez , Cielo Medel Rivero

Illustrations by: Marie Madeleine Rojas Dodeuil
